rules.description: Change german ö Key to [
Change german ä Key to ]
Change german ü Key to \
Change german ß Key to ~
Change german shift ö Key to {
Change german shift ä Key to ]
Change german shift ü Key to \
Change german option ö Key to ö
Change german option ä Key to ä
Change german option ü Key to ü
Change german option ß Key to ß
Change german shift option ö Key to Ö
Change german option ä Key to Ä
Change german option ü Key to Ü
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
left_control is hyper key
Change next tab shortcut in Firefox to ctrl+]
Change previous tab shortcut in Firefox to ctrl+[
Change next tab shortcut in Firefox to ctrl+] Planck
Change previous tab shortcut in Firefox to ctrl+[ Planck
Change previous tab shortcut in Firefox to ctrl+[ Moonlander
Change previous tab shortcut in Firefox to ctrl+] Moonlander
